content: TE DRS-C Dust removal system Dust removal system for SDS Plus ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Dust extraction attachments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Virtually dust-free drilling and chiseling with SDS Plus rotary hammers Interchangeable hoods in varying lengths to best suit the drill bit or chisel youre using Applications Virtually dustless drilling with drill bits of 5-28 mm diameter and 100 - 200 mm working length Virtually dustless drilling with drill bits of 3/16” to 1” diameter and 4 to 7-7/8 in length Virtually dustless chiseling with chisels 180 - 250 mm in length Virtually dustless chiseling with chisels 7-1/16 to 9-13/16 in length ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: TE 2, TE 2-S, TE 30, TE 30-A36 G02, TE 30-AVR G02, TE 3-C, TE 3-CL, TE 3-M, TE 3-ML, TE 4-A22, TE 6-A22 G04, TE 6-A36 G04, TE 7, TE 7-C Weight: 0.99 lb. Maximum drilling depth: 4.13 in Technical Data | For use with | TE 2, TE 2-S, TE 30, TE 30-A36 G02, TE 30-AVR G02, TE 3-C, TE 3-CL, TE 3-M, TE 3-ML, TE 4-A22, TE 6-A22 G04, TE 6-A36 G04, TE 7, TE 7-C | Weight | 0.99 lb | Maximum drilling depth | 4.13 in ### ITEMS- 2213351 - Dust removal system TE DRS-C BULK - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DRS-C Basic unit - 1x DRS-C Extraction head short - 1x DRS-C s Bellow - 1x DRS-C m Bellow - 1x Depth gauge - 1x Comfort side handle assy - 1x TE DRS-C Tool case assy - 2348912 - Rubber Extraction Head TE DRS-C long - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DRS-C m Bellow - 2348913 - Rubber Extraction Head TE DRS-C short - Package Size 2 pc Package Contents: - 1x DRS-C s Bellow
